body:
whoa whoa whoa, what is this? You're leaking a file descriptor here! Don't do that!

Also, an API that gives you a tempfile filename is basically *asking* for the user of the API to leak temporary files. Please clean up after yourself using an RAII class.
body_html:
whoa whoa whoa, what is this? You're leaking a file descriptor here! Don't do that!

Also, an API that gives you a tempfile filename is basically asking for the user of the API to leak temporary files. Please clean up after yourself using an RAII class.
body_text:
whoa whoa whoa, what is this? You're leaking a file descriptor here! Don't do that!
Also, an API that gives you a tempfile filename is basically asking for the user of the API to leak temporary files. Please clean up after yourself using an RAII class.
